org.sql: SELECT 1 AS one FROM work_packages INNER JOIN relations ON work_packages.id = relations.from_id LEFT OUTER JOIN statuses ON statuses.id = work_packages.status_id WHERE relations.to_id = "$1" AND relations.blocks = "$2" AND relations.hierarchy = "$3" AND relations.relates = "$4" AND relations.duplicates = "$5" AND relations.follows = "$6" AND relations.includes = "$7" AND relations.requires = "$8" AND statuses.is_closed = "$9" LIMIT 1
